short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your new tab experience with customizable themes, syncable preferences, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New Tabber - Productive New Tab
Transform your new tab experience with New Tabber, a Chrome extension designed to boost productivity. 
This is an ongoing product with various features are under development.
- Customizable UI with beautiful Backdrop Blur.
- Dark and Light mode is automatically set based on background dominant color.
- Customizable backgrounds - can be uploaded or fetched from Unsplash.
- Ability to add/delete bookmarks. Bookmarks can be arranged by your choice.
- Search bar with suggested queries from Google
- Synchronize settings across devices both automatically and manually
